alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:47PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 243 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms near the Snowcrest and Greenhorn Ranges in Southwest Montana. One cell was located near Virginia City, moving northeast at 40 mph with another about 15 miles north of Lima Reservoir tracking east. Strong wind gusts and lightning are expected with these storms in additional to brief rainfall and possible small hail. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Virginia City, Ennis, Alder, Jeffers, Laurin, Cameron and Raynolds Pass. This includes Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 5 , and between mile markers 1 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
